description:
"Yeah, I'm from the south."
That was no surprise, as Darin has a very strong accent.
He grew up in a very small town.
"Not very many people," he said. "Maybe like two grand."
His high school graduating class was only 30.
"I was top in the class," he said.
He also wrestled and liked to chase girls from other schools.
Another little fact: Darin had never tasted his own cum.
"Nah, no, never done that," he explained.
Of course, all of that changed during our shoot when he accidentally shot some into his mouth!
title: Darin
